config.helpText: Add and remove webhooks for your repositories.
config.noHooksConfigured: There are no hooks configured yet.
config.unknownConfigurationType: This configuration cannot be shown, because the type of the configuration is unknown. Probably this came from a plugin, that has been removed in the meantime. This configuration will not be used.

urlPattern.label: URL Pattern
urlPattern.helpText: The Url Pattern column specifies the url of the remote website. You can use patterns like ${repository.name} for the url.

executeOnEveryCommit.label: Execute on every commit
executeOnEveryCommit.helpText: If you enable the "Execute on every commit" checkbox, then the specified url is triggered for each commit in a push. If the checkbox is disabled, the url is triggered once in a push.

sendCommitData.label: Send commit data
sendCommitData.helpText: If the "Send commit data" checkbox is enabled, the plugin will send the commit data as json body with in the request.

method.label: Http Method
method.helpText: If the http method AUTO is chosen, the plugin will use a GET request, except when "Send commit data" is checked, then the plugin will use POST.

key.label: Key
key.helpText: The key of the header entry

value.label: Value
value.helpText: The value of the header entry

concealed.label: Concealed
concealed.helpText: Encrypt the header value on storage. The header value cannot be read by any user.

webhook.description: May create and modify global webhooks

*.description: May create and modify repository specific webhooks

webhook.description: May create and modify webhooks for this repository

BcTMDIHIb1.description: A webhook configuration could not be read correctly.
